pr_title: Changing sdk package name to cosmos for user agent

timeline.message: Updating user agent format as per central sdk guidlines
changing sdk package name to cosmos for user agent

timeline.bodyText: Isn't there a test to verify the prefix?
timeline.author: kirankumarkolli

timeline.bodyText: please also replace UserAgentContainer.AZSDK_USERAGENT_PREFIX with hard coded value for the test
timeline.author: moderakh

timeline.bodyText: ditto, for theSPACE, the only constant we should use here is the HttpConstants.Versions.SDK_VERSION
timeline.author: moderakh
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -87,7 +87,7 @@ private String getUserAgentFixedPart() {
         osName = osName.replaceAll("\\s", "");
         String geteUserAgentFixedPart =
             UserAgentContainer.AZSDK_USERAGENT_PREFIX +
-                HttpConstants.Versions.SDK_NAME +
+                "cosmos" +
                 "/" +
                 HttpConstants.Versions.SDK_VERSION +
                 SPACE +

timeline.bodyText:
btw, this class, has a test named UserAgentIntegrationTest() (from prior useragent PR), please change that to
userAgentIntegration() to follow test name code style.
timeline.author: moderakh
